text: Bard's Field, or Bard's Field on Trinity Manor, is a historic home located at Ridge, St. Mary's County, Maryland, United States. It was built in the early 19th century. It is a -story frame house on a brick foundation with double exterior end chimneys. The house is representative of a common, 18th century, Southern Maryland house type. Formerly operated as a bed and breakfast, it is currently (May 2012) for sale. Bard's Field was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1976. ==References== ==External links== *, including photo from 1999, at Maryland Historical Trust *St. Mary's County Historic Preservation Commission: Bard's Field entry * Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Maryland Category:Houses in St. Mary's County, Maryland Category:Historic American Buildings Survey in Maryland Category:Bed and breakfasts in Maryland Category:National Register of Historic Places in St. Mary's County, Maryland
